question_details.title: Will the National UFO Reporting Center report a sighting of a cube-shaped UFO in March 2025?
question_details.description: According to the [National UFO Reporting Center](https://nuforc.org/about-us/): "The National UFO Reporting Center was founded in 1974 by noted UFO investigator Robert J. Gribble. The Center’s primary function over the past five decades has been to receive, record, and to the greatest degree possible, corroborate and document reports from individuals who have been witness to unusual, possibly UFO-related events. Throughout its history, the Center has processed over 180,000 reports, and has distributed its information to thousands of individuals."
question_details.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as **Yes** if The National UFO Reporting Center posts a report of a sighting of a UFO/UAP shaped like a cube in March 2025 at [this link](https://nuforc.org/ndx/?id=event) when accessed by Metaculus on or after April 1, 2025.
question_details.fine_print: For example, although rare in the history of NUFORC, the month of December 2024 [had](https://nuforc.org/subndx/?id=e202412) six sightings with a cube shape.

news:
Here are the relevant news articles:

**Astronomical Events in March 2025: A Guide**
Astronomy enthusiasts are looking forward to the various astronomical events in March 2025, which coincides with the holy month of Ramadan. Some of the notable events include: the alignment of the Moon and the star Polux on March 9, the Moon and the Beehive Cluster on March 10, the Moon and the star Regulus (Heart of the Lion) on March 12. Additionally, there will be a total solar eclipse on March 12, a lunar eclipse on March 14, and a partial solar eclipse on March 29. 'It will be one of the most beautiful sights to observe high in the nights of Ramadan,' said the article. Other notable events include the alignment of the Moon and the star Spica (Alpha Virginis) on March 16, the Moon at its apogee on March 17, and the vernal equinox on March 20. 'The month of March will be filled with a variety of astronomical events that will be worth observing,' said the article.
Original language: ar
Publish date: March 07, 2025 08:11 AM
Source:[اليوم السابع](https://m2.youm7.com/story/2025/3/7/%D8%AF%D9%84%D9%8A%D9%84%D9%83-%D9%84%D8%A3%D9%87%D9%85-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B8%D9%88%D8%A7%D9%87%D8%B1-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%81%D9%84%D9%83%D9%8A%D8%A9-%D8%AE%D9%84%D8%A7%D9%84-%D9%85%D8%A7%D8%B1%D8%B3-2025-%D8%AA%D9%81%D8%A7%D8%B5%D9%8A%D9%84/6908391)

**Letters to the editor - March 7, 2024**
Galileo Galilei's complaint about philosophers refusing to look through a telescope 400 years ago still rings true today. In a recent speech, a politician highlighted the inequality of knowledge, specifically the existence of UFOs (Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena), which is deliberately restricted from the public. The pursuit of this subject is essential, as it threatens the existing geopolitical order and could force a re-evaluation of reality. By controlling what people believe is possible, those in power maintain their grip on society. The topic of UFOs expands the realm of possibility, shatters imposed narratives, and reopens the doors of human imagination, allowing people to dream again and question the status quo. If the existence of phenomena outside conventional physics were acknowledged, the consequences would be seismic, including the collapse of the energy industry and the loss of government control.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 07, 2025 05:35 AM
Source:[timesofmalta.com](https://timesofmalta.com/article/letters-editor-march-7-2024.1106136)

**Muu Magazine Explores the Unknown with Special Report on Near-Death Experiencer Takuji Kinoshita**
One Publishing has released the April issue of their magazine 'Muu' (Special price: 930 yen). The magazine is known for its in-depth coverage of mysteries and the unknown. The issue features a special report on the life and legacy of Takuji Kinoshita, a renowned near-death experiencer who claimed to have seen the truth about the universe and the future. Kinoshita, who passed away on December 1, 2024, was a comet hunter who discovered many comets and had three near-death experiences. He shared his experiences and insights about the past, future, and the universe, which challenged conventional wisdom and had a significant impact on many people. The issue also explores the possibility of a secret US-developed anti-gravity fighter jet, the TR-3B, and its alleged connection to the mysterious 'Black Manta' sightings. Additionally, it delves into the mystery of the 'Mu Dra' meditation technique and its connection to the 'Mu Dra' cards, as well as the Kennedy assassination and UFO cover-ups, and the alleged reincarnation of a Japanese boy who was a victim of the 9/11 attacks. Other topics include the El Tajin archaeological site in Mexico, the recovery of a mysterious egg-shaped UFO by the military, and the capture of a 'Sprite' phenomenon. 'Muu' is a magazine that explores the unknown and the unexplained, and this issue is no exception.
Original language: ja
Publish date: March 07, 2025 05:32 AM
Source:[プレスリリース・ニュースリリース配信シェアNo.1｜PR TIMES](https://prtimes.jp/main/html/rd/p/000000992.000060318.html)

**HSBC CUBE Cardholders Enjoy Exclusive Priority Ticket Purchasing Benefits for Two Major Music Events**
HSBC CUBE cardholders can enjoy exclusive priority ticket purchasing benefits for two major music events in 2025. The first event is the 'Wo Bao & China Blue Rock Star 2 Concert' by Taiwanese rock legend 伍佰, which will take place at the Taipei Arena from June 13-15. The second event is the 'FEAR AND DREAMS World Tour' by Hong Kong singer-songwriter Eason Chan, which will have six shows at the Kaohsiung Dome. Cardholders can purchase tickets one day before the general public, on March 14 for the Wo Bao concert and March 15 for the Eason Chan concert. HSBC CUBE cardholders can enjoy exclusive priority ticket purchasing benefits for these events, providing them with a unique musical experience.
Original language: zh
Publish date: March 07, 2025 02:11 AM
Source:[Udnemoney聯合理財網           ](https://money.udn.com/money/story/5613/8592035)

**Astronomical Events in March 2025**
During the month of March 2025, which coincides with the holy month of Ramadan, several notable astronomical events will occur. According to Dr. Ashraf Tadros, an astronomy professor at the National Research Institute of Astronomy, these events include the conjunction of the moon with the star Pollux, the conjunction of the moon with the Beehive cluster, and the conjunction of the moon with the star Regulus. Additionally, a total lunar eclipse will be visible in North America, Mexico, Central America, and South America, while a partial solar eclipse will be visible in parts of Africa. The moon will also be in its perigee, making it appear larger in the sky. Furthermore, the planet Neptune will be fully illuminated by the sun, making it visible to the naked eye. Finally, the sun will be at its zenith at noon, resulting in equal day and night lengths. These events are expected to be visible in the evening sky, and are a great opportunity for astronomy enthusiasts to observe and photograph them, provided the sky is clear and free of clouds and haze.
Original language: ar
Publish date: March 06, 2025 11:54 PM
Source:[اليوم السابع](https://www.youm7.com/story/2025/3/7/%D8%A7%D8%B3%D8%AA%D9%85%D8%AA%D8%B9%D9%88%D8%A7-%D8%A8%D9%84%D9%8A%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%89-%D8%B1%D9%85%D8%B6%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B4%D9%87%D8%B1-%D9%8A%D8%B2%D8%AF%D9%87%D8%B1-%D8%A8%D8%B8%D9%88%D8%A7%D9%87%D8%B1-%D9%81%D9%84%D9%83%D9%8A%D8%A9-%D9%85%D9%85%D9%8A%D8%B2%D8%A9-%D8%AA%D8%B3%D8%AA%D8%AF%D8%B9%D9%89-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%85%D8%AA%D8%A7%D8%A8%D8%B9%D8%A9/6908013)

**Primavera 2025: A Celebration of Abstract Art for a Good Cause**
The 30th edition of the Primavera art exhibition, organized by the Lions clubs Cholet cité and Cholet Mauges, will take place from March 14 to 23, 2025, at the Saint-Louis theater gallery in Cholet, Maine-et-Loire. The exhibition will feature 13 painters and 10 sculptors, including Michel Jouët, who will present a version of his famous 'Cube' for sale at 15,000 €. Other works will be priced between 6,000 and 7,000 €. The event aims to raise funds for the Handitou association, which supports people with disabilities. 'It's a good year,' says Robert Taupin, representative of the Lions club Cholet Mauges. 'There are two works around 6,000, 7,000 €,' he adds. The exhibition will feature a wide range of abstract art, with prices to suit all budgets, making it a great opportunity to enjoy art while supporting a good cause.
Original language: fr
Publish date: March 06, 2025 07:01 PM
Source:[Ouest France](https://www.ouest-france.fr/pays-de-la-loire/cholet-49300/a-cholet-un-cube-de-michel-jouet-uvre-star-de-la-30e-edition-de-lexposition-primavera-7f33c394-f9af-11ef-a6a4-567d76e1951c)

**ESA Prepares Probe to Meet Asteroid Apophis in Historic Flyby**
The European Space Agency (ESA) is preparing a probe to meet the asteroid Apophis, which will pass close to Earth on April 13, 2029. The asteroid, discovered in 2004, has a diameter of approximately 340 meters and will pass within 32,000 kilometers of Earth, a distance less than that of geostationary satellites. This rare event, estimated to occur once every 5,000-10,000 years, will be visible to the naked eye in Europe, Africa, and parts of Asia. According to the ESA, the asteroid can be studied in detail by a mission called Ramses, which aims to investigate the effects of gravitational proximity to Earth on the asteroid's structure. This will help develop methods for assessing potential threats from celestial bodies and determining ways to deflect them from our planet. To accelerate development, the ESA has decided to use the Hera probe's architecture, which is currently en route to the double asteroid Didymos. Hera will be accompanied by two mini-satellites (cubesats), which will aid in the research. Similarly, Ramses will receive two companions for a more detailed analysis of Apophis. The first cubesat has already been approved, and it will be created by the company Tyvak, with equipment including '...'. The second cubesat, according to preliminary plans, may be a lander that will allow for surface-level research on Apophis. Despite significant progress, the Ramses mission has not yet received final approval. A decisive meeting of the ESA Council of Ministers to approve the mission is scheduled for November 2025.
Original language: uk
Publish date: March 06, 2025 09:56 AM
Source:[ТСН.ua](https://tsn.ua/nauka_it/yevropa-gotuye-zond-dlya-zustrichi-z-asteroyidom-yakiy-proyde-nebezpechno-blizko-do-zemli-2781555.html)

**Magnetic Storm on March 6, 2025: Expect a Calm Day**
A magnetic storm on March 6, 2025, is not expected to cause any significant disruptions. According to the Laboratory of Solar Astronomy of the IКИ RAN, the solar plasma release will pass by Earth, resulting in a stable geomagnetic background with a reading of 3 or less. The solar wind speed is expected to be around 488 kilometers per second. The chances of a magnetic storm are 12%, and the probability of geomagnetic disturbances is 25%. In 63% of cases, the magnetosphere will remain stable. The flare activity index is in the yellow zone at 4.8. Six solar flares were recorded yesterday, with one reaching a class M. 'The main hypothesis is that the solar plasma cloud will pass by Earth,' said the astronomers. 'Initially, its movement was at an angle to our planet, making this scenario likely. However, there is a possibility of a delay due to a reevaluation of the plasma speed.' The current flare situation remains calm, with the most dangerous area on the Sun being the center 4012, which is gradually approaching the Earth-Sun line. There is a high probability of M-level flares in the next two days, but the impact of coronal holes on Earth is excluded until the end of the week.
Original language: ru
Publish date: March 06, 2025 03:48 AM
Source:[inbusiness.kz](https://inbusiness.kz/ru/last/magnitnaya-burya-6-marta-2025-goda-zhdat-li-ot-solnca-nepriyatnogo-syurpriza)

**'向锋而行' Civil Relay Action Launched to Promote Lei Feng Spirit Among Young People**
The '向锋而行' (Toward the Vanguard) civil relay action was launched on March 4, 2025, at Zhengzhou No. 18 Middle School. The event aims to promote the spirit of Lei Feng among young people and establish a long-term mechanism for popularizing his spirit. The event was attended by leaders from the Henan Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League, the Henan Provincial Education Department, and the Zhengzhou Municipal Government. As a social education force focused on the growth of young people, Maishuo Magic Cube Family Education was invited to participate in this meaningful event. Maishuo Magic Cube Family Education founder, Gao Yuan, said, 'Through this event, we will further fulfill our social responsibility and guide more young people to grow into responsible, caring, and selfless young people of the new era.' In the future, Maishuo Magic Cube Family Education will continue to work with society to create a better environment for the growth and development of young people, allowing the spirit of Lei Feng to take root in their hearts and shine brighter, contributing more to the progress of social civilization.
Original language: zh
Publish date: March 06, 2025 02:44 AM
Source:[中华网科技公司](https://digi.china.com/articles/20250306/202503061644368.html)

**National Gwangju Science Museum to Operate 2025 Astronomy Observation Program**
The National Gwangju Science Museum will operate the '2025 Astronomy Observation Program' from March 8 to 29, using the mobile science museum. The program, which targets families and general citizens, will allow participants to experience astronomy observation at a scenic spot in the Honam region. The program consists of professional explanations of the sun and telescope, and sun observation using a celestial telescope. Participants will be able to directly observe the sun's sunspots and solar flares. The astronomy observation program will be held at the following locations: March 8 at the Suncheonman National Garden, March 15 at the Damyang Children's Provençal, March 22 at the Gochang Gochang Dolmen Museum, and March 29 at the Suncheonman National Garden. Additionally, the Gwangju Agricultural Technology Center will operate the 'Rehabilitation Agriculture Program' for people with developmental disabilities from March 1 to 29. The program, which targets people with developmental disabilities, will allow participants to observe and harvest strawberries and tomatoes, and experience a mock shopping experience using products made from local wheat. The Gwangju Social Service Center will also launch a 'Second-generation Social Service Human Rights Advocacy Advisory Committee' and operate a human rights advocacy project for social service workers and users until December. The advisory committee will consist of experts, including the Gwangju Metropolitan Human Rights Ombudsman, lawyers, and field experts, who will listen to the opinions and concerns of field workers on human rights and reflect them in the project. The opinions of the advisory committee will be reflected in policies to be felt by workers, and human rights prevention activities will also be carried out.
Original language: ko
Publish date: March 06, 2025 02:31 AM
Source:[뉴시스 (NEWSIS)](https://www.newsis.com/view/NISX20250306_0003088396)

**Mysterious UFO Sighting in Heilongjiang: Witnesses Describe Red Object with Fiery Tail**
On March 2, 2025, at around 3:18 AM, multiple residents in Heilongjiang's Shuangyashan reported seeing a mysterious UFO with a long tail in the night sky. The object was described as a red color, brighter than stars, with a fiery tail that lasted for over 10 seconds. One witness, Liu from Shuangyashan, said, 'I was lying in bed when I saw a red object, brighter than stars, with a fiery tail, passing through the sky for about 10 seconds.' Another witness described the object as 'like a meteor' that passed through the eastern sky at around 6:00 AM. A netizen from Shuangyashan's Jixian County reported seeing a similar object moving from west to east, 'very fast and very bright.' However, local authorities have not confirmed the incident, stating that they have not received any reports and are currently unclear about the situation.
Original language: zh
Publish date: March 02, 2025 01:42 PM
Source:[std.stheadline.com](https://std.stheadline.com/realtime/article/2055869/%E5%8D%B3%E6%99%82-%E4%B8%AD%E5%9C%8B-%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%8D%E6%B1%9F%E6%B7%B1%E5%A4%9C%E7%8F%BE%E7%A5%9E%E7%A7%98UFO-%E7%9B%AE%E6%93%8A%E8%80%85-%E7%B4%85%E8%89%B2%E6%9D%B1%E8%A5%BF%E6%AF%94%E6%98%9F%E6%98%9F%E4%BA%AE%EF%B8%B1%E6%9C%89%E7%89%87)

**Pentagon makes bombshell announcement after pilot saw 'egg-shaped UFO'**
The US Department of Defense has confirmed it is investigating a whistleblower's claim that he recovered an 'egg-shaped' UFO from the ocean. Jake Barber, a government contractor, claims to have flown helicopters on covert missions to gather alien technology. He described flying 150 feet above an 'egg-shaped' object devoid of any engine or thermal signatures, saying, 'I saw an egg, a white egg.' This is the latest report of UAPs (unidentified anomalous phenomena) that the Pentagon admits they're actively scrutinising - adding this case to 21 others. The All-domain Anomaly Resolution Office (AARO) received 757 cases of UAP encounters from US authorities, including 272 incidents which occurred prior to 2023 but had never been reported publicly. Investigative journalist Ross Coulthart pointed out that AOIMSG's new director, Dr. Jon T. Kosloski, has very limited power when it comes to revealing government secrets, and that the Pentagon has a history of not being forthcoming about UAPs.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 02, 2025 05:19 AM
Source:[Mirror](https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/weird-news/pentagon-makes-bombshell-announcement-after-34769838)

**Leaked recording: US Air Force pilot reports UFO over California in 2024**
A US Air Force pilot reported a UFO sighting in September 2024 while flying a Beechcraft 350 in California. The pilot, identified as 'Troy 21,' described a football-sized, dark, cylindrical object passing underneath his wing. The incident was reported to the National UFO Reporting Center. Radar systems on the plane detected an object 60 miles away, but it is unclear if it was the same object. The UFO's speed exceeded Mach 2 within two minutes, which is not possible for most drones. This incident is one of several recent UFO sightings, including a temporary suspension of operations at the Gaziantep Airport in Turkey due to a reported UFO sighting.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 22, 2025 07:16 PM
Source:[India Today](https://www.indiatoday.in/world/shows/story/the-buzz-leaked-recording-us-air-force-pilot-reports-ufo-over-california-in-2024-glbs-2683725-2025-02-23)

**How Many UFO Reports in Columbia Basin Since January 1st, 2025?**
The National UFO Reporting Center (NUFORC) has tracked UFO sightings in the Columbia Basin since 1974. According to NUFORC, Washington state ranks 3rd in the US for the total number of UFO reports. Since January 1st, 2025, there have been several reported UFO sightings in the region, including a 'fireball' seen in Pasco, a blinking red circle observed in Kennewick, and a triangle-shaped object reported in a cornfield near Toppenish. While many UFO reports can be explained, some remain unexplained, leaving room for speculation about intelligent life. As NUFORC's founder said, 'it's kinda fun to see how many people have seen things in the sky they and experts just cannot explain.' 
Original language: en
Publish date: February 20, 2025 12:00 AM
Source:[97rockonline.com](https://97rockonline.com/ixp/136/p/how-many-ufo-reports-in-columbia-basin-since-january-1st-2025/)

**UFO Sighting in Guayaquil: Users Report Unidentified Object in the Sky**
Several users in Guayaquil reported a unidentified flying object (UFO) that was seen in the southern part of the city on the night of January 28, 2025. A video posted on social media shows a strange light in the sky, moving from top to bottom, which does not resemble the movements of a commercial or military plane. The triangular-shaped object appears to be too large to be a drone. This is not the first time that inexplicable movements of UFOs have been reported in Guayaquil, with similar incidents occurring in March and November of the previous year.
Original language: es
Publish date: January 29, 2025 02:27 AM
Source:[Diario El Telégrafo](https://www.eltelegrafo.com.ec/noticias/guayaquil/189/ovni-en-guayaquil-usuarios-reportan-objeto-no-identificado-en-el-sur-de-la-urbe)

**Congressman Claims Admiral Told Him About UFO Moving at Incredible Speeds Through Water**
Republican congressman Tim Burchett claimed that an admiral told him about a unidentified flying object (UFO) that moved at incredible speeds through the water, reportedly as large as a football field. Burchett said, 'They're telling me that something is moving underwater at hundreds of miles per hour, as big as a football field, underwater.' He stated that this was a documented case and an admiral had told him about it. Burchett has made claims that the US government is hiding the existence of UFOs and other extraterrestrial activities. However, he reassured Americans not to worry about the advanced capabilities of the alleged aliens, saying, 'I'm not afraid that they could do something to me. I mean, with these abilities, they would have grilled us a long time ago.' The US Congress is taking the reports of mysterious flying objects more seriously, treating the topic of UFOs, now often referred to as Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena (UAPs), as a serious issue. A Pentagon report in March 2024 stated that there was no evidence of the existence of UFOs, with many suspicious sightings being explained as weather balloons, spy planes, satellites, and other normal activities.
Original language: de
Publish date: January 28, 2025 09:42 AM
Source:[pravda-tv.com](https://anti-matrix.com/2025/01/28/ufo-gross-wie-ein-fussballfeld-bewegt-sich-unter-wasser-mit-hunderten-von-meilen-pro-stunde-so-ein-admiral/)

**US Congressman Claims Existence of Underwater Extraterrestrial Object**
US Representative Tim Burchett claimed that there is an unidentified object moving underwater at hundreds of kilometers per hour, according to international media reports. Burchett stated, 'They tell me something is moving at hundreds of kilometers per hour underwater, as big as a football field.' He claimed that the information came from an admiral, whom he did not identify. Burchett has previously stated that the US government is hiding evidence of extraterrestrial life. He said, 'I mean, with those capabilities, they would have grilled us a long time ago.' The Pentagon released a report in March 2024 stating that it had no evidence of UFOs and that many mysterious sightings were actually weather balloons, spy planes, satellites, and other normal activities.

**US Representative Claims Existence of Underwater UFO**
US Representative Tim Burchett claimed that there is allegedly an unidentified object moving underwater at hundreds of kilometers per hour, which is documented by the US military. According to Burchett, 'something is moving at hundreds of kilometers per hour underwater, as big as a football field,' he said in an interview with former Representative Matt Gaetz on a conservative platform, as reported by CBS. Burchett, who has previously suggested that the US government is hiding evidence of extraterrestrial life, stated that the information came from an unnamed admiral and that the case is documented. He reassured the public that they should not be concerned, saying, 'I mean, with those capabilities, they would have grilled us a long time ago.' The Pentagon released a report in March 2024 stating that it had no evidence of the existence of UFOs and attributed many mysterious sightings to weather balloons, spy planes, satellites, and other normal activities.

**US Representative Claims Navy Admiral Told Him of Extraterrestrial Ships Moving Underwater**
US Representative Tim Burchett recently mentioned in an interview that a Navy Admiral told him that there are extraterrestrial ships moving underwater at incredible speeds. Although the UFO topic has been ridiculed in the past, the US Congress has been increasingly taking reports of mysterious unidentified flying objects seriously. According to a report by Agence France-Presse, Representative Burchett told former Republican Representative Matt Gaetz, who hosts a show on the right-wing media outlet One America News Network, 'They told me that there's something underwater moving at hundreds of miles per hour... it's as big as an American football field.' Burchett emphasized that this incident is documented and was told to him by a Navy Admiral, but he did not reveal the Admiral's identity. Burchett is known for claiming that the US government is hiding UFO and extraterrestrial activity, and he believes that anything is possible in the vast universe. Currently, there is no evidence to suggest that intelligent life exists outside of Earth. Despite this, the US Congress is increasingly taking reports of mysterious flying objects seriously, turning the once-mocked UFO topic into a serious issue. The US Department of Defense released a report in March 2024 stating that it found no evidence of UFOs and that many reported sightings were actually of weather balloons, spy planes, satellites, and other normal activities.
Original language: zh
Publish date: January 25, 2025 02:06 AM
Source:[ETtoday新聞雲](https://www.ettoday.net/news/20250125/2899057.htm)

**US Representative Claims Navy Admiral Told Him of Alien Spacecraft Moving Underwater**
US Representative Tim Burchett recently mentioned in an interview that a Navy Admiral told him that there are alien spacecraft moving at incredible speeds underwater. Although the topic of UFOs has been ridiculed in the past, the US Congress has been increasingly taking reports of mysterious unidentified flying objects seriously. Burchett told OAN host Matt Gaetz, 'They told me that there's something underwater moving at several hundred miles per hour... it's as big as a football field.' Burchett emphasized that this incident is documented and was told to him by a Navy Admiral, but he did not reveal the Admiral's identity. Burchett is known for claiming that the US government is hiding UFO and alien activity, and he believes that anything is possible in the vast universe. Currently, there is no evidence to suggest that there is intelligent life beyond Earth. Despite this, the US Congress is taking reports of mysterious flying objects more seriously, and the topic of UFOs, now referred to as 'Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena', is becoming a more serious issue. The US Department of Defense released a report in March 2024 stating that they have found no evidence of UFOs and that many reported sightings can be explained by seeing balloons, spy planes, satellites, and other normal activities.
Original language: zh
Publish date: January 24, 2025 01:02 PM
Source:[RFI](https://www.rfi.fr/cn/%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E6%8A%A5%E9%81%93/20250124-%E7%BE%8E%E8%81%94%E9%82%A6%E4%BC%97%E8%AE%AE%E5%91%98%E7%A7%B0%E6%B5%B7%E4%B8%AD%E6%9C%89%E5%A4%96%E6%98%9F%E4%BA%BA)

**US Congress Takes UFO Reports Seriously, Representative Claims Navy Admiral Told Him of Underwater Extraterrestrial Activity**
US Representative Tim Burchett recently mentioned in an interview that a Navy Admiral told him that there are extraterrestrial ships moving at incredible speeds underwater. Although the topic of UFOs has been ridiculed in the past, the US Congress has been increasingly interested in reports of mysterious unidentified flying objects. According to a report by Agence France-Presse, US Representative Tim Burchett (R-Tennessee) told former Republican Representative Matt Gaetz, who hosts a show on the right-wing media outlet One America News Network, 'They told me there's something underwater that's moving at several hundred miles per hour... it's as big as a football field.' Burchett emphasized that this incident is documented and was told to him by a Navy Admiral, but he did not reveal the Admiral's identity. Burchett is known for claiming that the US government is hiding UFO and extraterrestrial activity. He stated that in the vast universe, anything is possible. Currently, there is no evidence to suggest that intelligent life exists outside of Earth. Despite this, the US Congress is increasingly taking reports of mysterious flying objects seriously, turning the once-mocked topic of UFOs into a serious issue. The US Department of Defense released a report in March 2024 stating that it found no evidence of UFOs and that many reported sightings were actually of weather balloons, spy planes, satellites, and other normal activities.

Publish date: January 24, 2025 10:18 AM

**AI Predicts Significant Increase in UFO Sightings in 2025**
According to artificial intelligence (AI) simulations, there may be a significant increase in unidentified flying object (UFO) sightings in 2025. The AI analysis is based on historical patterns, current data, and simulated scenarios. The AI suggests that the growth of observation infrastructure (high-definition telescopes, advanced satellites, and drones) and the relationship between solar activity and unusual atmospheric behavior may contribute to this increase. Additionally, the data indicates that periods of high solar activity may lead to unidentified aerial phenomena in the coming years, particularly around 2028, as stated by the AI. 'It is possible that UFO sightings will increase significantly in 2025,' the AI analysis concludes.

**Drone Fleet At Trump National Golf Club, New Jersey, USA Jan 4, 2025, UFO UAP Sighting News.**
On January 4, 2025, a UFO sighting was reported over the Trump National Golf course in Bedminster, New Jersey. Eyewitness Scott C. Waring described the objects as 'car size or bigger craft' with four whitish blue lights and a single large red light at its center. Waring stated that the objects were not small drones and were confirmed to be not airplanes using the flightradar24 app. Waring also mentioned that the truth about the sighting will be announced when Trump takes office on January 20th.

analysis_updates.points_reinforcing_prior_analysis: The significant astronomical events in March 2025 may lead more people to be observing the skies, potentially leading to an increase in reported sightings due to higher attention being paid to the skies.
analysis_updates.points_challenging_prior_analysis: No direct link between astronomical events and the specific reporting or observation of cube-shaped UFOs has been established.

phase_1_result.initial_reasoning: The National UFO Reporting Center has processed over 180,000 reports, indicating a long history of recording UFO sightings. Given that a cube-shaped UFO sighting, while not common, was reported six times in December 2024, it suggests a non-negligible but infrequent occurrence. Assuming an average number of UFO sightings reported monthly and considering the rarity of cube-shaped objects, I will estimate a base rate of approximately 5% for a cube-shaped UFO sighting in a given month based on historical data.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Increased Public Interest
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: With increased media coverage of UFOs and UAPs in recent years, more individuals are attentive and may report sightings more frequently, leading to a slight increase in the likelihood of reports being submitted and recorded for unusual shapes like cubes.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Patterns in Reports
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The occurrence of six cube-shaped sightings in December 2024 suggests a possible pattern or increased awareness of such shapes, which might increase the probability that people recognize and report a similar shape again in March 2025.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Volunteer Reporting System
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The volunteer nature of the reporting system may lead to unpredictable fluctuations in report submission, as it relies on public participation, which can vary greatly from month to month.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Seasonal Variation in Sightings
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Certain times of the year may see more outside activities and hence more observations of the sky, influencing the number of reports. March may have less outdoor activity compared to December holidays when social gatherings are prevalent.

analysis_updates.points_reinforcing_prior_analysis: The news article mentioning a prediction by AI of a potential significant increase in UFO sightings in 2025 may suggest an upswing in the number of reports submitted to the National UFO Reporting Center. Additionally, the astronomical events in March 2025 could lead to more people observing the night sky, potentially leading to more UFO sightings.
analysis_updates.points_challenging_prior_analysis: The report from the National UFO Reporting Center does not specifically mention cube-shaped sightings, emphasizing diverse shapes and descriptions. The focus on cubesats and astronomy-related technological advancements do not directly assert an increased likelihood of cube-shaped UFO sightings.

phase_1_result.initial_reasoning: To estimate the initial probability, I reviewed the historical frequency of cube-shaped UFO sightings reported by the National UFO Reporting Center. Given that December 2024 had six cube-shaped sightings, which is unusually high, and these shapes are rare according to the NUFORC historical database, I estimate the base rate of a cube-shaped UFO sighting in any given month to be low. Given that there have been over 180,000 total reports since 1974, this translates to a very small percentage for cube-shaped reports. From this, an initial base rate probability of 5% for seeing a cube-shaped sighting in March 2025 is reasonable.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Recent Trend in Cube Sightings
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Given the spike in cube-shaped UFO sightings in December 2024, there may be a higher tendency for similar reports in subsequent months due to a potential increased scrutiny or mass psychological effect. This increases the likelihood of such a sighting being reported in the near future.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Reporting Volume
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The overall reporting volume of NUFORC historically doesn’t highlight cube shapes as common. With only rare mentions over decades, the inherent rarity stabilizes probabilities. No specific external factors suggest elevated reporting in March specifically, beyond general activity.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Seasonal Patterns
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: March does not sit within any recognized period of increased UFO sightings historically, unlike summer months when sightings and reports tend to increase. This factor stabilizes or minimally dampens the probability relative to the base rate.

analysis_updates.points_reinforcing_prior_analysis: The 'Letters to the Editor' article discusses the ongoing conversation and skepticism around UFOs and governmental transparency, suggesting a heightened public interest in UFOs. The AI prediction for a significant increase in UFO sightings in 2025 further supports increased reporting and interest in UFOs.
analysis_updates.points_challenging_prior_analysis: Despite the increase in general UFO sightings predicted, none specifically relate to cube-shaped UFOs. Furthermore, the articles predominantly discuss other shapes or types of unidentified objects, such as egg-shaped or red with fiery tails, which do not align with a cube shape.

phase_1_result.initial_reasoning: To establish a base rate for cube-shaped UFO sightings reported by the National UFO Reporting Center, I consider the information provided about a similar situation in December 2024, where six cube-shaped UFOs were reported. Historically, such specific shapes like cubes are rare, but with over 180,000 reports processed, occasional sightings of distinctive shapes have occurred. From this information, sightings of cube-shaped UFOs seem unusual but not impossible. Assuming an average of one or two months similar to December 2024 in the past, I would estimate around 3% of months include reports of cube-shaped UFOs.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Reporting Dynamics
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: In sports, reporting is heavily influenced by media trends and narratives. Similarly, if there was significant media coverage or a notable event involving cube-shaped UFOs recently, it might increase self-reported sightings due to increased public awareness or hysteria. However, no specific event or trend has been identified that is likely to influence such reporting in March 2025.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Witness Visibility
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: In athletic contexts, visibility and public engagement impact the reporting of events substantially. In the context of UFO sightings, increased visibility of previous similar reports (e.g., December 2024) might encourage more people to report sightings, thinking they are not alone in witnessing such an event.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Random Variability
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: Just as player performance can be unpredictable and vary month to month due to numerous influences, the reporting of UFO shapes can similarly exhibit randomness. This randomness is inherent and could lead to the occurrence of reporting in any given month without specific cause.

analysis_updates.points_reinforcing_prior_analysis: The mention of numerous astronomical events in March 2025 increases public attention to the sky, potentially leading to more reports of UFOs as people spend more time observing celestial phenomena.
analysis_updates.points_challenging_prior_analysis: Among multiple reports and articles, there was no specific mention of cube-shaped UFO sightings, which challenges the likelihood of such specific sightings if they were to happen.

analysis_updates.points_reinforcing_prior_analysis: The AI prediction of increased UFO sightings in 2025 suggests a general upwards trend in reports, which might include unusual shapes like cubes.
analysis_updates.points_challenging_prior_analysis: The reports predominantly focus on different shapes or phenomena (e.g., egg-shaped, red fiery-tailed), not cube-shaped, indicating continued rarity.

phase_1_result.initial_reasoning: Based on historical data from the National UFO Reporting Center, cube-shaped UFO sightings are relatively rare. For instance, December 2024 had six cube-shaped sightings, but this is a recent occurrence. Over the center's extensive history since 1974, the vast majority of reported sightings describe more common shapes, such as disks or lights. Therefore, I estimate an initial probability of 10% for a cube-shaped UFO sighting in March 2025 based on the observed rarity of such events in historical data.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Recency Effect
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: The recent sightings in December 2024, although rare, could indicate an increased probability of such sightings being reported due to heightened awareness or misidentification. This suggests a greater willingness or tendency to report cube-shaped sightings.

perspective_derived_factors.name: Narrative Influence
perspective_derived_factors.reasoning: As a Literary Studies expert, narrative framing affects perception. The six December sightings might influence more reports by creating a narrative or expectation surrounding cube-shaped UFOs, encouraging observers to interpret ambiguous sightings as cubes.

analysis_updates.points_reinforcing_prior_analysis: The AI prediction of an increase in UFO sightings in 2025 based on historical patterns and technological advances supports the likelihood of continued UFO reporting, including cube-shaped sightings.
analysis_updates.points_challenging_prior_analysis: No specific mention or increase in cube-shaped UFO sightings is reported in the articles. The focus on other shapes or phenomena challenges the specific expectation of a cube sighting.

summary: After considering historical data, expert analyses, and recent news articles, the experts revised their predictions regarding the likelihood of the National UFO Reporting Center reporting a cube-shaped UFO sighting in March 2025. The experts initially estimated low probabilities due to the rarity of such sightings, with initial probabilities ranging from 3% to 41%. After reviewing news articles and updates, experts generally increased their probabilities, citing increased public interest, AI predictions of higher UFO sighting rates in 2025, and more observation activities due to astronomical events as reinforcing factors. However, the absence of specific reports of cube-shaped sightings in recent news led to some skepticism about the likelihood of such reports. The revised probabilities ranged from 10% to 56%, indicating that while experts acknowledged a potential for increased UFO reporting, the likelihood of specifically cube-shaped UFOs being reported remained uncertain.
